computer specs 'n stuff

it's a computer man....

Desktop: 2018 Dell Inspiron 5680

CPU: Intel Core i3-8100

4 cores, 4 threads, clock 3.60GHz, TDP 65w

benchmark scores: 2197 single thread, 6075 multithread

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3gb VRAM)

RAM: 32GB DDR4 (2x16GB socketed)

HDD: 2x 1TB Segate BarraCuda 7200rpm

SSD: WD Blue 1TB

Laptop: 2020 Lenovo ThinkPad T14 (Gen 1)

CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 PRO 4750U

8 cores, 16 threads, base clock 1.7GHz, boost 4.1GHz, min TDP 10w, max 25w

benchmark scores: 2468 single thread. 14805 multithread

GPU: AMD Radeon Vega graphics, integrated

RAM: 24GB DDR4 (16gb soldered, 8gb socketed)

SSD: WD Black NVMe 2TB
